channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Fabric – adding Scaling to MySQL
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-fabric-add-scaling-to-mysql/index.html#comment-369960">Dean Smith</a>.
With or without MySQL Fabric?
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dean Smith.

With or without MySQL Fabric?

Andrew.

item.title: By: Dean Smith
item.dc:creator: Dean Smith
item.description: Hi there, I am reaching out for a bit of help regarding the complete setup. I am new to setting up fail over and replication and was wondering if anyone could help with a step by step setup? I am working with cloud servers on rackspace. I would love to hear from someone with the time. Thank you. Dean
item.content:encoded:
Hi there,
I am reaching out for a bit of help regarding the complete setup. I am new to setting up fail over and replication and was wondering if anyone could help with a step by step setup?
I am working with cloud servers on rackspace.
I would love to hear from someone with the time.
Thank you.
Dean
